about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Stone Story "is a newly created MMORPG online PC game that is set against the backdrop of primitive tribal civilization. It integrates pet cultivation, strategic combat, and social exploration gameplay, and presents players with high-definition Q-version graphics to provide a novel and interesting adventure experience in the primitive world.

 

Game Background

Stone Story: Q Cute Primitives Fight Mechanical Tyrannosaurus Rex! The cross temporal adventure has officially begun.

When primitive humans collide with future black technology - the counterattack of primitive humans! The out of control masterpiece of Doctor Dinosaur in the future world, the mechanical tyrannosaurus, descended onto the primitive continent through a space-time black hole! In order to prevent this steaming steel behemoth from destroying the world, a group of silly primitive people launch a counterattack of "animal training+technology"!

Gameplay

Free domestication of hundreds of cute pets. Contains hundreds of unique pets, including classic primitive species such as Tyrannosaurus rex and Thunder Dragon, supporting capture, skill matching, and creating exclusive combat partners.

 

 

Pet evolution. The ultimate goal of pet cultivation is that different pets contain different potentials and evolve into more dazzling, cool, and powerful forms. We look forward to primitive people coming to tame them.

 

Strategic turn based combat. Adopting a turn based gameplay of character and pet collaboration, combined with attribute restraint, formation strategy, and skill combination, it tests the player's tactical layout ability.

 

Open world exploration. Seamless map design allows players to freely collect resources, challenge dungeon bosses, or participate in casual gameplay such as treasure hunting.
